description: System-generated unique identifier for each dynamic-attributes row, enabling linkage to the associated fleet entity.
Free-text attribute for the associated vehicle, asset, trip, or event (e.g., code or label). Meaning is configurable and likely varies by setup; confirm with SME.
Reference to a related record, likely the parent object (vehicle, driver, asset, or work order). Defines the relationship for this dynamic attribute; confirm with SME.
Monetary amount associated with this record (e.g., part cost, fee, or charge). Currency and rounding behavior are system-configured; specific use likely varies by process; confirm with SME.
Relevant date for the attribute (e.g., effective, expiration, or event date). Exact business meaning is configurable and likely varies by context; confirm with SME.
Yes/No indicator showing whether a condition applies to the associated fleet record. Specific condition is configurable and likely varies by deployment; confirm with SME.
General numeric attribute (supports decimals) for measurements, thresholds, or KPIs (e.g., weight, distance, percentage). Meaning is configurable and likely varies by setup; confirm with SME.
Whole-number attribute for counts, categorical codes, or selections. Meaning is configurable and likely varies by configuration; confirm with SME.
Freeform notes providing additional context for the associated fleet record (e.g., instructions, clarifications). Content varies by user input.
